app_description: Auto Translator iOS is a translation app for your iPhone you can translate text voice and pictures anytime anywhere. About Auto Translator: 1. Faster translation speed 2. Simple and easy to use operation interface 3. Support online and offline translation. 4. Support more than 100 languages. Text Translation: You can get the translated text immediately by inputting it through the mobile phone keyboard or you can choose the microphone output. Voice Translation: Don t want to type Real time voice translation can also be achieved against the phone s microphone. OCR Translation: Traveling abroad and don t know what the signs and restaurant menus are saying The text in the translated image can be automatically recognized by taking a photo. Auto Translator supports the following languages: English French Spanish Arabic Chinese Simplified Traditional Portuguese Swahili Urdu Catalan Czech Croatian Danish Dutch Esperanto Finnish German Greek Gujarati Hebrew Hindi Indonesian Vietnamese Khmer Macedonian Malay Malayalam Marathi Mongolian Filipino Bengali Farsi Hungarian Bulgarian Icelandic Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Korean Lao Latin Latvian Burmese Nepali Norwegian Polish Romanian Russian Serbian Sinhala Somali Slovak Sundanese Swedish Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Uzbek Welsh Zulu Afrikaans Amharic Armenian Albanian Arabic UAE Azerbaijani Cebuano Estonian Galician Georgian Haitian Creole Hausa Hmong Igbo Irish Kazakh Kinyarwanda Kurdish Lithuanian Luxembourgish Malagasy Maltese Odia Pashto Punjabi Sindhi Slovenian Sesotho Uyghur Yiddish and Yoruba. Completely free come and download it!
